MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL33 postcode area of Llanfairfechan affecting customers on Bryn Castell. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 6:04am. Our engineers have established that there is an underground cable fault and that repairs will be complex so we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power, and this should happen by 1:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:46am on 17th November 2020
